publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4441 Donald Gorrie: The Big Lottery Young People’s Fund—That the Parliament congratulates the Big Lottery Fund on successfully setting up 31 local panels of young people across Scotland to promote and process local applications to the Young People’s Fund and on developing schemes to explain their processes to applicants and to train the participants on the panels and suggests that the Scottish Executive should develop a similar process to help to direct grants to voluntary organisations to produce the best results for their community.

S2M-4441 Donald Gorrie: The Big Lottery Young People’s Fund—That the Parliament congratulates the Big Lottery Fund on successfully setting up 31 local panels of young people across Scotland to promote and process local applications to the Young People’s Fund and on developing schemes to explain their processes to applicants and to train the participants on the panels and suggests that the Scottish Executive should develop a similar process to help to direct grants to voluntary organisations to produce the best results for their community. Supported by: Patrick Harvie*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Ms Sandra White*
S2M-4441 The Big Lottery Young People’s Fund (lodged on 23 May 2006) Chris Ballance*, Linda Fabiani*, Robin Harper*, Dr Jean Turner*
S2M-4441 The Big Lottery Young People’s Fund (lodged on 23 May 2006) Rosie Kane*
S2M-4441 The Big Lottery Young People’s Fund (lodged on 23 May 2006) Mr Adam Ingram*
